id.title: ID
id.description: The component ID. Must be unique within all layouts/pages in a layout-set. Cannot end with <dash><number>.

hidden.title: Hidden
hidden.description: Boolean value or expression indicating if the component should be hidden. Defaults to false.

pageBreak.title: Page break
pageBreak.description: Optionally insert page-break before/after component when rendered in PDF

breakBefore.title: Page break before
breakBefore.description: PDF only: Value or expression indicating whether a page break should be added before the component. Can be either: 'auto' (default), 'always', or 'avoid'.

breakAfter.title: Page break after
breakAfter.description: PDF only: Value or expression indicating whether a page break should be added after the component. Can be either: 'auto' (default), 'always', or 'avoid'.

componentRef.title: Component reference
componentRef.description: String value indicating which layout component (by ID) the summary is for.

largeGroup.title: Large group
largeGroup.description: Boolean value indicating if summary of repeating group should be displayed in large format. Useful for displaying summary with nested groups.

excludedChildren.title: Excluded child components
excludedChildren.description: Array of component IDs that should not be shown in a repeating group's summary

returnToSummaryButtonTitle.title: ReturnToSummaryButtonTitle
returnToSummaryButtonTitle.description: Used to specify the text on the NavigationButtons component that should be used after clicking "Change" on the summary component

display.title: Display properties
display.description: Optional properties to configure how summary is displayed

hideChangeButton.title: Hide change button
hideChangeButton.description: Set to true if the change button should be hidden for the summary component. False by default.

hideValidationMessages.title: Hide validation messages
hideValidationMessages.description: Set to true if the validation messages should be hidden for the component when shown in Summary. False by default.

useComponentGrid.title: Use component grid
useComponentGrid.description: Set to true to allow summary component to use the grid setup of the referenced component. For group summary, this will apply for all group child components.

hideBottomBorder.title: Hide bottom border
hideBottomBorder.description: Set to true to hide the blue dashed border below the summary component. False by default.

nextButton.title: Display the next button
nextButton.description: Set to to true display a "next" button as well as the return to summary button
